casebody.data:
George BERKA
v.
CITY OF MIDDLETOWN Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 16, 2018

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 181 Conn.App. 159, ___ A.3d ___ (2018), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
